concept.title: Assign Descriptive Names to Raster Images
concept.shortdesc: You can change the name of an image by double-clicking the file listed on the Image Manager. You can assign the image name different from the file name, the image is attached to the drawing without extension name.

conbody.p: To rename an image, any name within 255 characters including letters, numbers, spaces and all the special characters Microsoft®Windows®or ZWCAD can be used.
If two raster images of the same name originated fromdifferent paths are attached to the drawing, system automatically distinguish themby adding numbers after the image name.
